needs: Samuel seeks to deliver measurable engineering outcomes by reducing costs, weight, and waste through pragmatic design and process improvements. He needs to operate effectively in ambiguous environments, swiftly clarifying constraints and goals, while establishing data-driven iteration and cross-functional alignment. Timely delivery of incremental, well-instrumented solutions that maintain safety and user visibility is critical.
personality: Samuel communicates with clarity and transparency, preferring collaborative, facilitative engagement. He values simplicity, accountability, and readable documentation, using small probes and prototypes to uncover unknowns early. His work style emphasizes data-guided iteration, ownership, and continuous improvement, combined with a disciplined approach to risk and stakeholder alignment.
